test.label: accessibility
test.question: Is the road leading to the nursery motor able?

test.label: road sign
test.question: Is there a nursery road sign?

test.label: mobility
test.question: Does the nursery design allow easy movement of vehicles and people?

test.label: positioning
test.question: Are the seedlings well positioned and centered in the pot relative to the root ball?

test.label: planting nature
test.question: Is there one plant per pot that is single, straight, sturdy, and well centred in the pot?

test.label: post mature seedlings
test.question: Look for absence of overgrown seedlings in the nursery/seedlings carried from the previous season?

test.label: roots nature
test.question: Are the roots well positioned( coiled roots in the pot is a minus) and is there satisfactory root development?

test.label: Sorting
test.question: Are there seedlings sorted into species and age?

test.label: Ratio
test.question: Is there a good Root:Shoot ratio(1:2)?

test.label: height
test.question: Are the seed  or transplant beds constructed at the recommended height?(at least at 30 cm high) to facilitate proper root development

test.label: cleaness
test.question: is the nursery weeded and clean?

test.label: coloration
test.question: Are there symotims of nutrient deficiencies?

test.label: transplanting
test.question: For nurseries raising seedlings that require pricking out; Is the transplanting of the greminants to the growing beds/pots done with great care to prevent deformation of the root system?

test.label: Occurance
test.question: Are there incidences of plants and diseases?

test.label: pests
test.question: For any dected pests wre they reported to the relevant authorities(KEFRI) and appropriate preventive and control measures taken?
